episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the lesser-known White Cliffs of Croydon, the mysterious existence of the world's most expensive super yacht, the serendipitous rise of Ace of Base due to a stuck cassette, and the surprising benefits of medical clowns in increasing pregnancy rates.

facts.fact: As well as the world famous White Cliffs of Dover, Britain is home to the world unknown White Cliffs of Croydon.
The world's most expensive super yacht probably doesn't exist.

The reason that the band Ace of Base became successful is because a cassette of their music got stuck in a producer's car, and after two weeks of having nothing else to listen to, he went from hating it to liking it.
Being visited by a clown can help you get pregnant.
